data.name: Titans Clinic
data.description:
Have unstoppable sandbox fun in Titans Clinic - the ultimate sandbox dental studio and nail salon simulator for titans! 

Playfully tackle dental dilemmas with a variety of tools. From teeth cleaning to caries destruction, use your creativity to address the unique dental needs of your titan clients, including characters like gorilla, vampire, princess, Santa Claus, alien, and zombie.

Latest version of Titans Clinic introduces an extraordinary nail salon mode!

Immerse yourself in the whimsical world of titan nail artistry, providing a diverse range of tools and features to elevate your nail design game to new heights. Explore the vast array of tools, including the pliers and incrustation options, to meet the discerning tastes of your titan clients.

Key Features:
ü¶∑ Creative Dental Sandbox: Craft unique smiles and jaws by combining different incrustation elements, tooth shapes, and materials.
üíÖ Nail Salon Mode: Indulge in an extraordinary nail salon experience with a diverse range of tools, patterns, and colors.
üõ†Ô∏è Variety of Tools: From brushes and pliers to drills and heal guns, explore a diverse set of tools to cater to your titan clients' needs.
üéâ Fun and Playful: Enjoy the whimsical experience of being a titan dentist and nail artist, turning routine appointments into entertaining adventures.

Embark on a journey of dental and nail care like never before in Titans Clinic ‚Äì where every smile and every nail is a masterpiece!
